name: fileUpload
description: File chooser for uploading a document to a form

properties.label: Required
properties.name: required
properties.help: In the context of a form container, use $form.$invalid as a Boolean to check form validity in a widget property

properties.label: Read only
properties.name: readOnly
properties.help: The current file can not be modified

properties.label: Placeholder
properties.name: placeholder
properties.help: Short hint that describes the expected value

properties.label: URL
properties.name: url
properties.help: Defines endpoint URL where the file will be uploaded

properties.label: New File
properties.name: newFile
properties.caption: Any variable: myData or myData.attribute
properties.help: Holds the response from the upload endpoint. That value can be used to fulfill a contract

properties.label: Existing file
properties.name: currentFile
properties.caption: Any variable: myData or myData.attribute
properties.help: Display a download link for the current document. Will be empty if a new file is uploaded or the current file is removed.

properties.label: File deleted
properties.name: deleteFile
properties.caption: Any boolean variable: myData or myData.attribute
properties.help: Holds the boolean value from the widget indicates whether or not the file has been deleted by the user.

properties.label: Error on upload holder
properties.name: errorContent
properties.help: Holds the response content from the upload error endpoint. That value can be used to guidance purpose
